modName: Satella or Emilia (Re Zero) v2 Preset for ECE
summary: Satella, the Witch of Envy from the anime Re:Zero, now as an ECE preset. Or just Emilia.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][center][color=#ff0000]INSTALL THIS PRESET MANUALLY[/color][/center][/size][/b]
[size=3] Satella, the fearful half-elf witch who is the main antagonist in the anime Re:Zero, now can walk across Skryim. Since she's nearly identical to Emilia, this preset can fit to her also. She's a Breton (closest race to the Half-Elf concept).
[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WjkZfJE.jpg[/img]



[center][b][size=5]Requirements for v2:[/size]
[/b][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enchanced Character Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty PLAYER
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url]

[b][size=5]Recommended:
[/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52431/?]Shanoa Armor[/url]
[/size]ENB

[b][size=5]How to install:
[/size][/b][b]Download manually and extract the slot file to Documents/My Games/Skyrim/CME_save
Start the game and go into the character creation menu (console command: showracemenu)
Set race to Breton and load Slot 7.


Sorry for any mistakes. English is not my native language.

[b][size=5]Future versions:
[/size][/b]Satella/Emilia follower!

[/b][b][size=5]Permissions:
[/size][/b][b]If you use my preset in your mod or upload it anywhere, please credit me. 
[/b]
